title: Primož Roglič Crashes Heavily, Defends Lead at Itzulia Basque Country
content:
The Bora-Hansgrohe star finished the stage with his jersey ripped to shreds, and with deep abrasions to right shoulder, elbow, hip, leg, and back.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Crashes Heavily, Defends Lead at Itzulia Basque Country on Velo.
author: ahood
